discoveredAssets: localhost:5000 - Flask/Werkzeug web application (Python 3.13.3) - Port 5000 - Dalgona Challenges platform
http://localhost:5000/ - Root index page (200 OK) - Challenge listing and navigation
http://localhost:5000/xss25 - XSS Challenge #25 endpoint (200 OK) - POST submission support (Allowed: OPTIONS, POST, HEAD, GET)
http://localhost:5000/static/css/ - Static CSS stylesheets (200 OK) - Includes style.css and xss/index.css
http://localhost:5000/static/img/ - Static image resources (200 OK) - PNG images including logo5_white.png, favicon, and challenge feedback images

targets.objective: Test XSS Challenge endpoint for: input validation vulnerabilities, XSS injection opportunities in solution parameter, challenge logic bypass, and potential information disclosure through error messages or response analysis
targets.rationale: This is the primary interactive endpoint of the application. It accepts user input via POST method with 'solution' parameter and processes challenge submissions. This endpoint represents the main attack surface for the application and should be tested for injection vulnerabilities, business logic flaws, and security implementation issues.

targets.objective: Test root index page for: HTML injection, client-side vulnerabilities, link hijacking, static resource path traversal, and information disclosure through page content or metadata
targets.rationale: The root page is the entry point to the application and contains links to challenge pages and references to static resources. Should be tested for common web vulnerabilities and information disclosure.

keyFindings: [MEDIUM] Werkzeug development server in use - typically development/testing infrastructure, not for production. Version 1.0.1 identified.
[HIGH] XSS Challenge platform with user input submission endpoint (/xss25) - should be tested for injection vulnerabilities and business logic bypass
[LOW] Static resources (CSS, images) are served with 12-hour caching (Cache-Control: public, max-age=43200)
[LOW] No robots.txt, sitemap.xml, or API documentation endpoints discovered
[LOW] Static directory listing disabled - individual resources accessible but directory not browsable
[MEDIUM] Single challenge endpoint available (xss25) - limited attack surface but focused testing opportunity
